Description: Glazed composition shabti of Neferibraseneb with a striated lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, parallel hands in relief holding a hoe, an adze and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder, the waist is inscribed with a row of incised Hieroglyphs and there is a similarly inscribed column running down the front of the leg section; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
